welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Little Egg Harbor, where the charm of our quaint town and its beautiful beaches await you. Take in the peaceful scenery and immerse yourself in the local culture during your stay. Enjoy your visit!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlantic City International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Atlantic City International Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robert J. Miller Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robert J. Miller Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
